incomingsupport.subject: [Ticket: %s]
incomingsupport.body1: A customer has sent the following info

secret_link.subject: %{sender_email} sent you a secret
secret_link.link_works_once: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.

welcome.subject: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email
welcome.title: Welcome to %{product_name}!
welcome.verify_prompt: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
welcome.copy_link_prompt: Or copy and paste this link:
welcome.postscript: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.

password_request.subject: Reset your password (%{display_domain})
password_request.title: Reset Your Password
password_request.request_notice: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.
password_request.copy_link_prompt: Or copy and paste this link:
password_request.ignore_notice: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
password_request.postscript: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.

incoming_secret.subject: You've received a secret message
incoming_secret.someone_sent: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.
incoming_secret.view_instructions: To view this secret, click the link below:
incoming_secret.link_works_once: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.

secret_revealed.subject: Your secret was viewed
secret_revealed.title: Your Secret Was Viewed
secret_revealed.automated_notice: This is an automated notification. No action is required.

expiration_warning.subject: Your secret link will expire soon
expiration_warning.expires_in: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}
expiration_warning.view_button: View your secret before it expires
expiration_warning.after_expiration: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
expiration_warning.after_expiration_short: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.

organization_invitation.subject: You've been invited to join %{organization_name}
organization_invitation.title: You've been invited to join %{organization_name}!
organization_invitation.body: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.
organization_invitation.link_instruction: Or copy and paste this link:
organization_invitation.expiry_notice: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.
organization_invitation.decline_instruction: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.
organization_invitation.postscript: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.

password_changed.subject: Your password was changed (%{display_domain})
password_changed.title: Your Password Was Changed
password_changed.body: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.
password_changed.security_notice: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.

email_changed.subject: Your email address was changed (%{display_domain})
email_changed.title: Your Email Address Was Changed
email_changed.body: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.
email_changed.security_notice: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.

email_change_confirmation.subject: Verify your new email address (%{display_domain})
email_change_confirmation.title: Verify Your New Email Address
email_change_confirmation.body: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.
email_change_confirmation.copy_link_prompt: Or copy and paste this link:

mfa_enabled.subject: Two-factor authentication enabled (%{display_domain})
mfa_enabled.title: Two-Factor Authentication Enabled
mfa_enabled.body: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
mfa_enabled.security_notice: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.

mfa_disabled.subject: Two-factor authentication disabled (%{display_domain})
mfa_disabled.title: Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
mfa_disabled.body: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
mfa_disabled.warning_notice: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.

new_login_alert.subject: New sign-in to your account (%{display_domain})
new_login_alert.title: New Sign-In Detected
new_login_alert.body: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.
new_login_alert.not_you_notice: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.

member_removed.subject: You've been removed from %{organization_name}
member_removed.title: You've Been Removed from %{organization_name}
member_removed.body: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.

role_changed.subject: Your role was changed in %{organization_name}
role_changed.title: Your Role Was Changed
role_changed.body: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.

organization_deleted.subject: Organization "%{organization_name}" was deleted
organization_deleted.title: Organization Deleted
organization_deleted.body: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.

payment_receipt.subject: Payment receipt for %{product_name}
payment_receipt.title: Payment Receipt
payment_receipt.body: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:

payment_failed.subject: Payment failed for %{product_name}
payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.body: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.

trial_expiring.subject: Your %{product_name} trial expires in %{days_remaining} days
trial_expiring.title: Your Trial Is Ending Soon
trial_expiring.body: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.

subscription_changed.subject: Your %{product_name} subscription was changed
subscription_changed.title: Subscription Changed
subscription_changed.body: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
